00028 
00029 void mcs::Env::chkTree()
00030 {
00031   string s = path;
00032   unsigned int size;
00033 
00034   if (! File_Dir_Exist(s, size)) {
00035       if (cl_work)
00036     mkDir(s);
00037       else
00038       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DIRECTORY_NOT_FOUND, s.csz);
00039   }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 void mcs::Env::LoadConf()
00044 {
00045   //General values                                                 Default values
00046   appvers            = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "APPVERS"        , "0.0"                     );
00047   path               = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "PATH"           , Pwd()                     );
00048 //LN-darwin
00049 #ifdef __APPLE__
00050   interface          = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "INTERFACE"      , "lo0"                     );
00051 #else
00052   interface          = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "INTERFACE"      , "lo"                      );
00053 #endif
00054 //interface          = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "INTERFACE"      , "127.0.0.1"               );
00055   port               = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "PORT"           , MCS_DEFAULT_PORT          );
00056   timeout            = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "TIMEOUT"        , MCS_DEFAULT_CLIENT_TIMEOUT);
00057   max_users          = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "MAX_USERS"      , MCS_DEFAULT_MAX_USERS     );
00058   db_user            = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "DB_USER"        , ""                        );
00059   db_pass            = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "DB_PASS"        , ""                        );
00060   db_name            = cnf->sval("MCS_Generic", "DB_NAME"        , ""                        );
00061   cl_local_kills_mcs = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "local_kills_mcs", 0                         );
00062   cl_have_db         = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "have_db"        , 0                         );
00063   cl_custom_auth     = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "custom_auth"    , 0                         );
00064   cl_logfile         = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "logfile"        , 0                         );
00065   cl_work            = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "work"           , 1                         );
00066   cl_work_cid        = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "work_cid"       , 0                         );
00067   cl_logstdout       = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "logstdout"      , 1                         );
00068   cl_createlocal     = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "createlocal"    , 1                         );
00069   cl_restartlocal    = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "restartlocal"   , 0                         );
00070   cl_clean_logout    = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "clean_logout"   , 0                         );
00071   cl_read_grants     = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "read_grants"    , 0                         );
00072   cl_autoexec        = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "autoexec"       , 0                         );
00073   cl_use_ssl         = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "use_ssl"        , 0                         );
00074   cl_chunksize       = cnf->ival("MCS_Generic", "chunksize"      , MCS_DEFAULTCHUNKSIZE      );
00075 
00076   //Application specific values
00077   appvers            = cnf->sval(appname      , "APPVERS"        , appvers           );
00078   path               = cnf->sval(appname      , "PATH"           , path              );
00079   interface          = cnf->sval(appname      , "INTERFACE"      , interface         );
00080   port               = cnf->ival(appname      , "PORT"           , port              );
00081   timeout            = cnf->ival(appname      , "TIMEOUT"        , (int) timeout     );
00082   max_users          = cnf->ival(appname      , "MAX_USERS"      , max_users         );
00083   db_user            = cnf->sval(appname      , "DB_USER"        , db_user           );
00084   db_pass            = cnf->sval(appname      , "DB_PASS"        , db_pass           );
00085   db_name            = cnf->sval(appname      , "DB_NAME"        , db_name           );
00086   cl_local_kills_mcs = cnf->ival(appname      , "local_kills_mcs", cl_local_kills_mcs);
00087   cl_have_db         = cnf->ival(appname      , "have_db"        , cl_have_db        );
00088   cl_custom_auth     = cnf->ival(appname      , "custom_auth"    , cl_custom_auth    );
00089   cl_logfile         = cnf->ival(appname      , "logfile"        , cl_logfile        );
00090   cl_work            = cnf->ival(appname      , "work"           , cl_work           );
00091   cl_work_cid        = cnf->ival(appname      , "work_cid"       , cl_work_cid       );
00092   cl_logstdout       = cnf->ival(appname      , "logstdout"      , cl_logstdout      );
00093   cl_createlocal     = cnf->ival(appname      , "createlocal"    , cl_createlocal    );
00094   cl_restartlocal    = cnf->ival(appname      , "restartlocal"   , cl_restartlocal   );
00095   cl_clean_logout    = cnf->ival(appname      , "clean_logout"   , cl_clean_logout   );
00096   cl_read_grants     = cnf->ival(appname      , "read_grants"    , cl_read_grants    );
00097   cl_autoexec        = cnf->ival(appname      , "autoexec"       , cl_autoexec       );
00098   cl_use_ssl         = cnf->ival(appname      , "use_ssl"        , cl_use_ssl        );
00099   cl_chunksize       = cnf->ival(appname      , "chunksize"      , cl_chunksize      );
00100 }
00101 
00102 void mcs::Env::DumpConf()
00103 {
00104   Conf* cnf;
00105 
00106   cnf = new Conf(inipath);
00107 
00108   cnf->setval(appname, "APPVERS"        , appvers           );
00109   cnf->setval(appname, "PATH"           , path              );
00110   cnf->setval(appname, "INTERFACE"      , interface         );
00111   cnf->setval(appname, "PORT"           , port              );
00112   cnf->setval(appname, "TIMEOUT"        , (int) timeout     );
00113   cnf->setval(appname, "MAX_USERS"      , max_users         );
00114   cnf->setval(appname, "DB_USER"        , db_user           );
00115   cnf->setval(appname, "DB_PASS"        , db_pass           );
00116   cnf->setval(appname, "DB_NAME"        , db_name           );
00117   cnf->setval(appname, "local_kills_mcs", cl_local_kills_mcs);
00118   cnf->setval(appname, "have_db"        , cl_have_db        );
00119   cnf->setval(appname, "custom_auth"    , cl_custom_auth    );
00120   cnf->setval(appname, "logfile"        , cl_logfile        );
00121   cnf->setval(appname, "work"           , cl_work           );
00122   cnf->setval(appname, "work_cid"       , cl_work_cid       );
00123   cnf->setval(appname, "logstdout"      , cl_logstdout      );
00124   cnf->setval(appname, "createlocal"    , cl_createlocal    );
00125   cnf->setval(appname, "restartlocal"   , cl_restartlocal   );
00126   cnf->setval(appname, "clean_logout"   , cl_clean_logout   );
00127   cnf->setval(appname, "read_grants"    , cl_read_grants    );
00128   cnf->setval(appname, "autoexec"       , cl_autoexec       );
00129   cnf->setval(appname, "use_ssl"        , cl_use_ssl        );
00130   cnf->setval(appname, "chunksize"      , cl_chunksize      );
00131   cnf->save();
00132   delete cnf;
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 mcs::Env::Env(string app, string inipath) {
00137   char* p;
00138   string s;
00139 
00140   flog=NULL;
00141   cnf = NULL;
00142   appname=app;
00143   server = NULL;
00144   local=NULL;
00145   srand(time(0));
00146 
00147   ssl_ctx = NULL;
00148   sslcert = "";
00149   sslpriv = "";
00150 
00151 
00152   //Getting host name
00153   localhost="localhost";
00154   if ((p=getenv("HOSTNAME")))
00155     localhost=p;
00156 
00157   this->inipath = inipath;
00158   cnf = new Conf(inipath);
00159   LoadConf();
00160 
00161   //Remove trailing slash
00162   remTrailing(path, "/");
00163   chkTree();
00164 
00165   //Eventually open log file
00166   if (cl_logfile) {
00167     char ts[20];
00168     const char *format="%Y%m%d%H%M%S";   //Format time string
00169     const int lenfmt=strlen(format)+3;   //Three more for century and NULL
00170     time_t tp=time(NULL);
00171     strftime(ts, lenfmt, format, localtime(&tp));   //Time-stamp
00172 
00173     s=path;
00174     s+=string("/mcs-") + appname + string("-");
00175     s+=ts;
00176     s+=".log";
00177 
00178     flog=new ofstream(s.csz, ios::app);
00179     if (!(flog->is_open()))
00180     throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_CANT_OPEN_FILE, s.csz);
00181   }
00182 
00183 #ifdef HAVE_OPENSSL_SSL_H
00184   if (cl_use_ssl) {
00185     unsigned int ui;
00186     string s;
00187     sslcert = path + "/" + string(MCS_SSLCERT);
00188     sslpriv = path + "/" + string(MCS_SSLPRIV);
00189 
00190     if ((! File_Dir_Exist(sslcert, ui))   ||
00191     (! File_Dir_Exist(sslpriv, ui))      )
00192       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_ERROR, "Can't found certificate and private key files, run \"mcscreatekey\"");
00193   }
00194 #endif //HAVE_OPENSSL_SSL_H
00195 
00196   //DumpConf();
00197 }
00198 
00199 
00200 
00201 mcs::Env::~Env()
00202 {
00203 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00204     if (cl_have_db)
00205     db.close();
00206 #endif
00207 
00208   if (cnf)
00209     delete cnf;
00210 
00211   if (flog)
00212     if (flog->is_open())
00213       flog->close();
00214 
00215   //if (x509)
00216   //  delete x509;
00217   //DumpConf();
00218 }
